name: 科鲁姆·费奥瑞 Colm Feore
intro: Colm Feore, OC (born August 22, 1958) is an American-Canadian stage, film and television actor best known for his roles as First Gentleman Henry Taylor on the television series, 24, as General Brockhart on House of Cards, and as Lord Marshal Zhylaw in The Chronicles of Riddick.
birthplace: 美国,马萨诸塞州,波士顿
